website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a small, lightweight camera with good low-light performance, the Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX100 is a good choice; just don't zoom all the way in on the photos.
cons: Photos aren't great at 100 per cent

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful camera. Much better than the 3 Nikon Coolpix I had - all 3 of them broke (2 with the battery door and one with the screen). It's very reliable and has excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. High Quality. Couldn't ask for a better camera for the price. Can't go wrong with this Sony Camera
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Crisp Photos
customer_reviews.text: This tiny camera works wonders and takes outstanding pictures. This is by far the best camera I have bought to date.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camera is great!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is just as I expected and meets all expectations as the descriptions provide. It takes crisp pictures and has nifty affects.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera was very good. We are very happy with it. It has lots of functions and it`s easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: fabiana

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought a new one.
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera but I should have bought a new one. This one has lint or something inside the camera and it shows on all my pictures with a lighter background. I did not notice it until many months after the purchase because I had not taken any pics of the sky.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Small but nice
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, and very happy with it. Would recommend it to anyone. Hope all these words helps someone. good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Micro USB cable same size as Kindle.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Only had it a few hours, so not a lot of detail to add except that it seems to perform really, really well. take the time to run through its various features and options and you'll be glad you did. By the way, I've seen some comments on Q&A sites wondering about how to find a replacement for the micro USB cable that comes with the camera. Its not a "normal" size, but I just found that it seems to be the same size as the micro USB cable for the Kindle! No problem finding those around. Problem solved! :-)
customer_reviews.author: gillesjm

customer_reviews.title: Love my Camera, but there's a downside to this one
customer_reviews.text: I love my camera. It works perfectly well. the images are 10 times better quality than my other cameras. It has many features that are useful. sometimes using this camera, i feel like i have a DSLR already. Love the way it has the blur out function and many more. The only downside is that I lost my cable that connects the camera to the Comp or the charger. So My camera has been dead for months. I cannot charge my battery whatsoever. For this type of camera, you cannot find another USB cord that fits if you loose it. So i'm stuck having to buy another whole battery kit that's going to cost over $50. boooo
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Would Choose Something Different
customer_reviews.text: Unimpressed. I have had a few digital cameras before and this has been my least favorite. Contrary to other people's reviews, I don't find it easy to use. I am not very camera savvy so that could greatly be my problem, but I find my pictures are always blurry. The 18.2 megapixels doesn't seem to be any significant improvement on my 12 and 14 megapixel cameras from before, so don't be drawn in to this camera just for that aspect. I've only had it a year but I am trying to get rid of it for something much more user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1023

customer_reviews.title: love this product but...
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Great size and great quality. I use it for videos and it takes HD 1060p. Video quality seeks better than camera but I haven't played around with the camera much. The low light just turns the pictures orange. But overall, wonderful camera.
customer_reviews.author: Brogan

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly Impressed
customer_reviews.text: While on vacation I fell in love with my friend's canon powershot camera and decided once I got home to ditch my Nikon cool pix for a powershot. I am so happy I purchased this Sony cyber-shot camera instead!! It exceeded all my expectations and then some. The picture quality is exceptional, it shoots great videos, and has an easy mode to make usage a breeze. There are so many functions. Overall this is an exceptional point and shoot. My only pet peve is th battery life is really short. Even with that defect I still give it a 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Spoogiewoogie

customer_reviews.title: p. oberlander is gay!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera!! Works great!! Like any device they can break easily if you dont take care of them! Thats what cases are for!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Greg droddy
